Params: {1: '1', 3: 'This part is just the light refraction layer... around 20 centimeters thick.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee & Watanabe', 3: 'Yeah, to prevent direct penetration from railguns or other similar ordnance.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "There's more: the armor layer, blast-proof layer, second armor layer, utility layer, reactive armor, auxiliary blast-proof layer, aux reactive armor...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The actual core compartment would probably be... some 20 meters below.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'm not sure what led you to this conclusion, but the elevator is right there.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "If the elevator doesn't work, we can just go down via the maintenance staircase.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Well, if we want to use the elevator—or even the stairs—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "We'll have to get through those things first.", 4: '1'}
